pages.title: Amaranth Spitter
pages.text: One of the larger spitter varieties, it displays a pale violet coloration, and can be found feeding in the microbiota that lives in clay. $(br2)Prone to territorial fights, beware approaching them

pages.title: Amaranth Spitter
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:glow_lichen$(br2)Number of Offspring: 3$(br2)Growth time: 8 Days
